The program was terminated while it was looping (condition evaluating to false)

Likely no reproduceable because the program needs to be terminated during an 
evaluation to cause the bug. Evaluation engine needs to be aware of program 
terminations.
Jared,please assess the impact (not sure we need to fix).

We need to add handling of termination to the evaluation engine.

The interpreter currently keeps trying to evaluate instructions while
instructions remain. We need to add a debug event listener which can stop the
interpreter and not report results to listeners.

When an evaluation engine is terminated, it terminates all of its evaluation
threads.

Added logic to EvaluationThread to stop the interpreter when this happens. Added
logic to the Interpreter to stop processing instructions.
